title: How to unsubscribe from Max
description: Learn how to cancel your Max (formerly HBO Max) subscription. Follow these steps to unsubscribe whether you signed up directly through Max or via a third-party provider like Apple, Google, or Amazon.

steps_1.title: Cancel Max Subscription via Max Website/App
steps_1.description:
If you subscribed directly through Max:

*   Go to the Max website or app and sign in to your account.
*   Go to your Profile or Account section.
*   Select Subscription or Billing.
*   Choose Cancel Subscription and confirm your cancellation.

steps_2.title: Cancel Max Subscription via Third-Party Provider
steps_2.description:
If you subscribed through a third-party provider:

*   Determine where you subscribed to Max (directly through Max or a third-party provider).
*   Cancel your subscription through that provider's platform.

steps_3.title: Cancel Max Subscription via Apple App Store
steps_3.description:
To cancel via the Apple App Store:

*   Go to your iPhone/iPad settings.
*   Tap your Apple ID.
*   Tap Subscriptions.
*   Tap Max.
*   Tap Cancel Subscription.

steps_4.title: Cancel Max Subscription via Google Play Store
steps_4.description:
To cancel via the Google Play Store:

*   Open the Play Store.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Tap Payments & subscriptions.
*   Tap Subscriptions.
*   Tap Max.
*   Tap Cancel subscription.
